articles.description: Senior figures in sport maintained personal contact with Jeffrey Epstein, while others were discussed regarding potential deals.
articles.title: Epstein files: Football, F1, and NFL bosses kept links after sex conviction

articles.description: John Virgo was an excellent snooker player, a hugely popular TV figure, and one of the great voices of his beloved sport.
articles.title: John Virgo obituary: Snooker, Big Break and BBC commentary - the Salford sage leaves his stage

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at Manchester City's evolution and why the January window has offered renewed belief.
articles.title: Manchester City: Pep Guardiola succession plan and team rebuild

articles.description: In a wide-ranging interview, Brendon McCullum talks about Harry Brook's altercation with a nightclub bouncer and the criticism of England's off-field behaviour.
articles.title: Brendon McCullum on Harry Brook, Ashes and Noosa trip

articles.description: Dundee will inspect the Dens Park pitch to assess whether their Scottish Premiership game against Motherwell can go ahead on Wednesday evening.
articles.title: Dundee v Motherwell pitch inspection before Premiership game

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how the New England Patriots managed to make such a remarkable turnaround this season to make the Super Bowl, and  if it signals the rise of their 'evil empire'.
articles.title: NFL Super Bowl 60: Are the New England Patriots back? Drake Maye & Mike Vrabel the new Tom Brady & Bill Belichick

articles.description: Ellis Genge believes bookmakers' odds and recent results do not reflect Wales' threat to England in Saturday's Six Nations game at Twickenham.
articles.title: England v Wales: Ellis Genge warns of visitors' threat in Six Nations opener

articles.description: James Harden is set to join the Cleveland Cavaliers from the Los Angeles Clippers, with Darius Garland moving in the opposite direction.
articles.title: NBA: James Harden to join Cleveland Cavaliers as part of Darius Garland trade with LA Clippers

articles.description: India will play England in the final of the Under-19 World Cup after a record-breaking run-chase against Afghanistan in Harare.
articles.title: India beat Afghanistan to reach final of U19 Cricket World Cup

articles.description: BBC Sport finds evidence raising questions over the neutral eligibility of four Russian athletes.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: Russian athletes linked to pro-war activity
